subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. said Thursday that its referees made a mistake when they ejected forward Blake Griffin in the Los Angeles Clippers’ 105-103 loss at Golden State on Wednesday night.
snippet: The N.B.A. said Thursday that its referees made a mistake when they ejected forward Blake Griffin in the Los Angeles Clippers’ 105-103 loss at Golden State on Wednesday night.
